name: Princess Tea Party- Girls Makeup, Dressup and Makeover Game
name_original: Princess Tea Party- Girls Makeup, Dressup and Makeover Game
description:
-It’s a wonderful sunny afternoon, gorgeous princesses are heading to the fantasy royal tea party!
-You will have great fun in the most fabulous party: doing bath and spa to relax your mind and body, put on royal hairstyle, makeup and dresses!
-Be the most beauty princess and win the prince’s heart!
-Prepare delicious cupcakes and drinks for your princess friends!
-Decorate your tea party table with delicate cups, teapots, cakes, macarons and flowers!

Product Features:
-Princess tea party themed beauty makeover game.
-Use easy controls to dress up your princess and give her a breathtaking head-to-toe look!
-Glowing skin after the most luxury royal bath and spa!
-Dreamy eye makeup, blushes and lipsticks, various hairstyles!
-Fabulous dresses, fancy gowns, cute tops and skirts, beautiful diamond tiaras and accessories, luxury bags and shoes!
-DIY your own princess style cupcakes, layer cakes, lollipop cakes and milk shakes!
-Host the royal tea party with the best party table display!

Enjoy the dreamy tea party with gorgeous princesses! Be the royal stylist!
Come on and join us!

How to play:
-Use interactive controls to play the game.
-Choose your favorite princess
-Do spa, makeup and hairstyle, dress up for the royal tea party!
-Prepare cakes, macarons, juices and so on.
-Set your own party table!
-Photos with other princesses and the prince!
-Have great fun at the party!

Contact us:
Any suggestions? Let us know what you think!
You can find us on
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hugsNheartsGames
